Definition: It also known as the seventh month or Ghost Month, a traditional Chinese festival celebrated on the 7th month of the lunar calendar. This is a time when it is believed the gates of the afterlife open and spirits roam free among the living. It is customary to offer food, drinks, and incense to these wandering spirits.
Example: Eh, you know the Hungry Ghost Festival coming soon ah, better not go out too late at night.
